Text: GAME SHOW SUPPORTguys thanks a million for supporting the game show GPGETS showed up in record numbers With that in mind the campaigners of ETS would like to invite you all to a Sundae Wednesday Next Wednesday August th please join all of your st floor ETS supporters for a nice cool sundae If theres anyone from the st floor that Ive overlooked please foward this email to them Location st floorOn the Market Services side of the floor Look for the balloons Time pm ONLINE PLEDGE CARDSWe are asking that all online pledge cards be completed before the Sundae Wednesday Thanks ETS Campaigners

United WaySundae Wednesdaymorning hope everyone had a great weekend Now lets get back to helping millions Dont forget to fill out your online pledge card before the Sundae Wednesday And remember we will be having Million dollar Sundaes on Wednesday in front of the copy machine where the celebrations are usually held If you need assistance with your online pledge card please feel free to give me a call at ext Thanks Pam

RE badlands Cc This is a follow up email from my voice mail We agree with your generation for the following months January May and August where generations was provided by Riverside Please invoice EES for the above mentioned months as soon as possible and I will remit payment If you have any questions please feel free to contact me at Thanks Pam Original Message From Peter Arellano mailto Sent Thursday October PM To Cc Subject badlands a copy of the meter quantities for the months of may and august is attached as discussed please let me know what you find out about the discrepancies richard informs me that you should be able to forward the volumns for the month of september soon is he making promises that you cant keep an invoice for the month of january will follow as agreed
Here is the documentation of Badlands unit Forwarded by Pamela CarterHOUEES on AM From Jim nronXgate on PM To Pamela ES cc Subject Here is the documentation of Badlands unit

Riverside Update Cc After speaking with Chris Boster it was noted that we can not pass the imbalance charges back to riverside I will be working with Jim Reyes to find out what chargesrevenue EPMI is invoicing EES Richard I will let you know as soon as I find out the details on the amount of time its going to take to pull those numbers out of our total ancillary services invoice Pam

Riverside Charges Cc Richard I spoke with Chris BosterEPMI and Jim Reyes they agreed that we are schedulling the Riverside Generation However we are not passing the charges back to them for not meeting their obligation If you would please give me a call so that I may further discuss this matter with you Thanks Pam
Riverside Generation Cc Richard I left a message with Jim Reyes again this morning As soon as i hear from him I will inform you If you have an questions you can contact me at Pam

Riverside Update Cc Richard I have left messages with Jim ReyesEPMI concerning the Riverside issue He has not returned my called Ive left you a voice mail today and Jim as well concerning the forementioned As soon as I hear from Jim I will give you a call Pam

EES Jan Cc Richard it appears there was more than one day of generation however only one day produce dollars I am going to forward this on the Riverside to see if they agree to the statement forwarded by EPMI If you have any reservation about me forwarding this please let me know Thanks Pam Forwarded by Pamela CarterHOUEES on PM From Jim nronXgate on PM To Pamela ES cc Subject EES Jan

CEC Reporting Information Cc poRichard attached is the CEC reporting infomation for Nov Once you have put the purchase information in would you please save the entire work sheets to JconsumerreportingpowervolumesreportingGreenCEC under the applicable file word document I am going to keep a Monthly folder of all of the CEC reporting I have also set up an excel folder with the backup for the sales if you would like to view that before filing If you have any questions please feel free to contact me at X Pam

NYISOComparison Cc po Jay here is the comparisons you asked for Please note that November is not completed however I contacted the NYISO to get access to the web page so that I could pull the monthly actuals I was told that Richard Ring could give me a userid and password to access this information I left a voice mail with Richard as soon as I have access I will complete November and forward it to you If you have any other questions please feel free to contact me at Pam
December CEC Reporting Cc poHeres your december numbers Please save in the appropriate places once completed with the purchases Thank you Pam
Re Daily EES Position nsf Kate would you please forward me the Daily positions for and I have the others that you sent Thanks Pam
